text:
How do we flatten the curve?
By taking the necessary precautions:
Washing hands thoroughly, using alcohol based sanitizers in absence of water and soap, avoiding public spaces or sick people, limiting contacts, going out only when necessary, not touching your eyes nose mouth, etc

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.
